channel.title: [317] X-Isle PK Base [317] Easy to code!
channel.description:
Hello, this is my first ever release of a 317 server. It is Pk based and very easy to code. It is almost entirely blank and for [b]YOU[/b] to work on. There are no customs, but if you look in the [u][b]item.cfg[/b][/u] you will find some items that people suggested. The only supported client with no nulls is the Silabsoft Client! Credits are given at the bottom of the page.
[center]Features[/center] Fixed dupe Fixed bugs/glitches 95% Perfect PKing Specs added Some gs stances 50% done PK follow 50% Working doors Some packet handlers Magics More Stability All Godswords And Some shops added to help you
[center]PICTURES[/center] ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ [center]Home:[/center] [IMG]http://i974.photobucket.com/albums/ae228/do0obie/Welcome.jpg[/img]
[center]Shops:[/center] [IMG]http://i974.photobucket.com/albums/ae228/do0obie/Shops.jpg[/img]
[center]PK Zone:[/center] [IMG]http://i974.photobucket.com/albums/ae228/do0obie/PK.jpg[/img]
[center]Train:[/center] [IMG]http://i974.photobucket.com/albums/ae228/do0obie/train.jpg[/img]
[center]Players Online in just 1.5 days of uptime[/center] [IMG]http://i974.photobucket.com/albums/ae228/do0obie/players.jpg[/img]
Like I said, its for you to work on, so don't flame/spam.
[b]DOWNLOAD LINK:[/b] [url=http://uppit.com/v/9ZGMVZ4Q]http://uppit.com/v/9ZGMVZ4Q[/url]
Credits: Mod Allstar - Allstar-Scape Me(`Xero 123/Mod Lite) - Coding off Allstar-Scape
Have Fun!
